document.full_text: the nba suspended detroit pistons forward charlie villanueva five games on wednesday for an on-court altercation and attempting to escalate the incident by entering the opposing team's locker room twice.
document.title: league bans pistons' villanueva five games for altercation
lines_and_colors: the nba suspended detroit pistons forward charlie villanueva five games on wednesday for an on-court altercation and attempting to escalate the incident by entering the opposing team's locker room twice.
